summary: Contoso Wireless has a product streaming service that allows customers to access movies, TV shows, music, and more on their devices. The service is free for all Contoso Wireless customers and can be accessed on smartphones, tablets, computers, and more. Customers also have access to content from over 50 different sources including popular streaming services like Netflix and Hulu. The service can be shared with up to five people in the same household and also offers exclusive deals and discounts from partners.
